page.title: 09MIXED FARMING AT MIDDLETON
page.content: Mr Medwell has one house cow,11 calves, one bull,26 heffers and 50 beast.He also has 470 lambs,300 ewes and employs one man.He grows potatoes, wheat and barley.Some of the land is let to people who have ponies.For this he charges 4 pounds per week.70 acres of the land is flood land,46 acres arable land under the plough. His farm is mentioned in the East Midlands Tourist Board brochure.His wife provides bed and breakfast accomodation. Another leisure activity is a glider club which uses one of Mr Medwell's grass fields for take off and landing.
